title: Noam Chomsky - 2003-04-05 - The Invasion of Iraq & its World Wide Implications - Boulder, Colorado
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality. Noam begins speaking at 4:46 in.
On April 5, 2003, Noam Chomsky spoke in Boulder, Colorado, on the then recently launched attack on Iraq.  Chomsky is introduced by David Barsamian of Alternative Radio.

For the audio, I gave it a very extensive restoration: digital noise reduction to remove a persistent hissing, and went over it second by second to reduce or eliminate as many audio flubs as possible, including several attacks of high frequency squealing/squeaking that appear to be damage to the video tape.


For the video, I fixed the aspect ratio - which was too wide - and improved the contrast somewhat.


Earlier I uploaded an audio-only version with inferior sound quality, now deleted.
